works.description: The streetlight is an essential public facility and plays an indispensable role for safety and townscape of the city. However, a huge amount of electricity is consumed to light up the street lights, so it can be a burden for the modern city, causing insufficient energy supply. Industrial designer Woojin Kim is proposing a sustainable lighting solution that doubles as a bench to be utilized as a public facility. Dubbed Double Life, the concept streetlight design is powered by generator-condenser unit
